meanings.definition: To make or become longer or stretched out.
meanings.sent1: She elongates her hair by using hair extensions.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar elongates as it transforms into a butterfly.
meanings.sent3: The magician elongates the scarf to make it seem never-ending.
meanings.sent4: Time elongates when you're waiting for something exciting to happen.
meanings.sent5: The artist elongates the painting to create a sense of depth and perspective.

meanings.sent1: The road elongates as it stretches into the distance.
meanings.sent2: The snake elongates its body to reach the prey.
meanings.sent3: The joke elongates as the comedian adds more funny details.
meanings.sent4: Her smile elongates across her face when she sees her favorite dessert.
meanings.sent5: The river elongates through the valley, carving a path over time.
